infos.value: As I thought, it seems there's no one left alive here.
The Sanctum and Rundall are equally terrifying in their power...
You appear to be recovering...and rather quickly, at that.
Hmm... So you were able to sense our presence.
Wait a moment. Your enemy is Rundall, is it not?
But in the grand scheme of things...
The only reason that the Sanctum has yet to become part of Rundall is because of Gilgamesh's presence. Am I wrong?
Being the enemy of our enemy does not make him an ally.
Just who the hell do you think you are, anyway?
If you intend to impede us, all the while blabbering on about your useless morals...
Oh, no. Whatever shall I do?
